oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Resilience based on the principle of the individual living organism
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Piamonte Peña, Rene
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper aims to propose practical actions towards resilience capacity strengthening based on the principle of the agricultural organism as an individual living organism. The concept application and practice, strengthens the stability of the organism when facing adverse events, including environmental, economic and social issues.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Piamonte Peña, Rene (2014) Resilience based on the principle of the individual living organism. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
